meanings.definition: The quality or state of being reliable.
meanings.sent1: Her reliablenesses in completing tasks on time earned her a promotion.
meanings.sent2: The reliablenesses of the old car made it a popular choice among buyers.
meanings.sent3: The reliablenesses of the alarm clock were put to the test when it failed to ring on Monday.
meanings.sent4: His reliablenesses in keeping secrets was like a sturdy lock on a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The reliablenesses of the lighthouse guided ships safely through the stormy night.

meanings.definition: The ability to be trusted or depended on.
meanings.sent1: The reliablenesses of the weather forecast helped people plan outdoor activities.
meanings.sent2: Customers appreciate the reliablenesses of the company's delivery service.
meanings.sent3: The reliablenesses of the squirrel to find nuts amazed the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: His reliablenesses in fixing things was like having a superhero on speed dial.
meanings.sent5: The reliablenesses of the compass ensured they never lost their way in the dense forest.
